There/EX are/VBP essentially/RB two/CD forms/NNS of/IN radiation/NN ./. Ionizing/JJ radiation/NN is/VBZ a/DT form/NN of/IN energy/NN emitted/NN from/IN the/DT damaged/JJ nuclear/NN plant/NN which/WRB can/MD cause/VB immediate/JJ effects/NN like/IN radiation/NNP sickness/NNP -LRB-/NNP vomiting/NNP ,/, burns/NNP etc/UH -RRB-/NNP These/NNP forms/NN of/IN radiation/NN exist/NN as/IN a/DT form/NN of/IN energy/NN -LRB-/NN like/IN light/JJ or/CC electromagnetic/JJ energy/NN -RRB-/NN and/CC are/VBP either/JJ Xrays/NN or/CC gamma/NN rays/NN ./. Radiation/JJ contamination/NN in/IN foods/NN is/VBZ a/DT different/JJ matter/NN altogether/NN ./.
